text: @realDonaldTrump You're so welcome. And by the way, Donnie Dipshit, saying that there wouldn't be so many cases of covid-19 if there weren't so many tests? MORONIC. Have Barron teach you cause and effect. #TrumpIsAnIdiot https://t.co/b6jJPTwPWc
